articles.title: Travis Scott, Astroworld Victims Battle in Court Over Rapper’s Charity Initiative - Billboard
articles.description: Attorneys for victims say Scott is litigating through the media and want him subjected to a gag order. Scott's lawyers argue that doing so would violate his right to free speech.
